Description:
Detects issues with Windows Defender Real-Time Protection features

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems), Christopher Peacock '@securepeacock' (Update)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Windows Defender Real-Time Protection Failure/Restart
Query: sourcetype='windows-windefend' eql select * from _source_ where ((eventid = '3002' or eventid = '3007') and  not (feature_name = '%%886' and (reason = '%%892' or reason = '%%858')))
